ComicInfo.Summary: "Witches" part 2 of 5! As Bufkin and Baba Yaga battle it out, Beauty and the Beast make a startling discovery that will greatly affect their future and the entire fate of Fabletown. Only Frau Totenkinder knows the truth about the horror that is to come...and she's not exactly telling.

ComicInfo.Title: Totenkinder, Chapter Two of Witches
